articles.title: What's March Madness with no fans? A good way to prevent coronavirus, one group says
articles.description: Much of the hoopla surrounding March Madness is in the crowds, where basketball fans slather themselves with body paint to support their teams. But that madness could fade away this year if one players' advocacy group gets its way.
